course_title: Evolution of the Earth with Lab
requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: History of earth in context of changing global environments. Emphasizes biological systems interacting with global processes: plate tectonics, climate change, sea level; lab exercises on minerals, rocks, fossils, geologic maps.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 120 or ENVS 131 or ENVS_ OX 131 or OX BIOL 111 equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
sections:
Class Nbr: This section is full 2906, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: A. Martin, Status: Wait List
Class Nbr: This section is full 2907, Section #: LAB, Type: LAB, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: A. Martin, Status: Closed
